explanation: [0-0] In a room with blue walls adorned with white cloud patterns, three individuals are seated on wooden stools. The woman in the center wears a headdress with two white feathers, has tattoos on the insides of both arms, and is dressed in a white feathered jumpsuit. The woman on the left has flame-patterned hair, wears a red checkered outfit, and has red gloves on her hands. The man on the right has blue hair, wears blue gloves, and is dressed in a pink T-shirt and blue pants. Behind them stands a man wearing a green plant prop on his head and a brown short-sleeved shirt. Seven emojis are displayed above the scene: speechless, smirking, robot, smiling, questioning, wronged, and angry. A large white number 3 is in the middle of the screen.

[0-2] Then, the white subtitles in the center change sequentially: 3, 2, 1, Go. The man with the green plant prop makes a speechless emoji expression and takes out a blue-gray vacuum cleaner. The woman in the center with the feathered headdress throws her hands up in fear and runs away to the left.
